channel.title: Go to any site at school, the fool-proof way
channel.description:
There is a site that allows you to make up any site, example being "sitename.co.nr." This site can redirect to whatever you want, Myspace, runescape, moparisthebest, whatever you want!
http://www.freedomain.co.nr/
Make up any domain name you want. For example, I could make one named "alexowns.co.nr," and I could make the web page actually contain MySpace. Now, myspace is blocked at my school, but this particular site, if I made it, would not be blocked.
Currently, I am making many co.nr's for all of you to use. It is all FREE!!!

item.title: Go to any site at school, the fool-proof way
item.dc:creator: @shawrty shawrty
item.description:
@shawrty wrote:

well i made 2 one for runescape and one for myspace both still got blocked both for chat!!!.. but anyways the runescape one is www.schooliscool.co.nr and the myspace one is www.schooliscool2.co.nr

Read full topic
item.source: Go to any site at school, the fool-proof way

item.title: Go to any site at school, the fool-proof way
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

I actually prefer this:http://www.shorturl.com.
Its free, has a really small banner and has pretty good endings (excuse me but I forgot what they’re called :P). For example:
This is my clan site (dead now):
www.legionofdoom.2fear.com
Thats pretty sweet eh?

Read full topic

item.title: Go to any site at school, the fool-proof way
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“james, post:5, topic:16522”]actually if you set your home page as google or something it deactivates all the filters.

also try www.ninjaproxy.com that will get you past anything[/quote]

My school doesn’t let you change your homepage, or go onto any proxy sites.

Read full topic
